summary: The concept of "teacher training" is integral to the EU's educational framework, emphasizing the necessity for qualified educators in fostering effective teaching methodologies. Within EU legal and regulatory documents, teacher training encompasses various directives and initiatives aimed at enhancing pedagogical skills and competencies. This includes the establishment of standards for initial teacher education and ongoing professional development, ensuring that educators are equipped to meet diverse learning needs. The EU promotes collaboration among member states to share best practices in teacher training, thereby enhancing the quality of education across the region and supporting the overarching goal of lifelong learning.
